comments:
CDT 2.0.0.200403291152
Eclispe M8

I have seen this exception a number of times under seemingly different
circumstances.  This cascade occurred after kicking off a build in the C/C++
perspective and trying to switch to the progress view.

At first glance it looks like an Eclipse problem, but "org.eclipse.cdt" appears
in there too - so I'll let someone else make the decision on who will handle it ;)


!SESSION Mar 30, 2004 08:52:37.281 ---------------------------------------------
java.fullversion=J2RE 1.4.2 IBM Windows 32 build cndev-20040322 (JIT enabled: jitc)
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments: -showlocation
